axis.description: The axis of the grid lines to display

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

aspectRatio.description:
The aspect ratio to maintain for the crop area (width / height).
For example, an aspect ratio of 16 / 9 will maintain a width to height ratio of 16:9.
If not provided, the crop area can be freely resized.

cropShape.description: The shape of the crop area.

defaultFlip.description: The initial flip state to apply to the image.

defaultRotation.description: The initial rotation to apply to the image in degrees.

defaultZoom.description: The initial zoom factor to apply to the image.

fixedCropArea.description: Whether the crop area is fixed in size and position.

flip.description: The controlled flip state of the image.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  viewport: string
  image: string
  selection: string
  handle: (position: string) => string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the image cropper elements

initialCrop.description:
The initial rectangle of the crop area.
If not provided, a smart default will be computed based on viewport size and aspect ratio.

maxHeight.description: The maximum height of the crop area

maxWidth.description: The maximum width of the crop area

minHeight.description: The minimum height of the crop area

minWidth.description: The minimum width of the crop area

nudgeStep.description: The base nudge step for keyboard arrow keys (in pixels).

nudgeStepCtrl.description: The nudge step when Ctrl/Cmd key is held (in pixels).

nudgeStepShift.description: The nudge step when Shift key is held (in pixels).

onCropChange.description: Callback fired when the crop area changes.

onFlipChange.description: Callback fired when the flip state changes.

onRotationChange.description: Callback fired when the rotation changes.

onZoomChange.description: Callback fired when the zoom level changes.

rotation.description: The controlled rotation of the image in degrees (0 - 360).

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identify accessibility elements and their states.

zoom.description: The controlled zoom level of the image.

zoomStep.description: The amount of zoom applied per wheel step.
